change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: James White Cureton was a pioneer cattleman in southern New Mexico and Texas. Collection includes business correspondence, financial accounts, and livestock records of cattle operations in New Mexico.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Cureton Cattle Company papers (MS 033). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: James White Cureton was a pioneer cattleman in southern New Mexico and Texas.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Business correspondence, financial accounts, and livestock records of cattle operations in New Mexico.

controlaccess.subject: Cattle trade -- New Mexico -- History -- Sources.
